__e: You ain't always right about shit and you're wrong about that girl.
But if you mess with someone's heart, there's nothing anyone can do about it, except me.
I can't help it if you got your days of the week wrong.
I don't know who you think you are, son, but you got the wrong fucking guy!
Now, if she says you have the wrong girl, then you have the wrong girl.
Well, you're wrong, and-- either you're right, and your friend is...
But you gotta be wrong sometime, and I'd say you're about due.
A few years ago we had no way of telling that you're wrong and I'm right.
Maybe you're wrong about what's best for this family too.
You... you are mistaken in what you say and in how you see me.
If I could do it all over again but you can't you mess up a single minus and... The whole calculation goes to hell.
Yeah, well that's where you're wrong. I don't think it is one guy.
Well, you're wrong about that too.
Yeah, and what if you're wrong about later?
